characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: At the start of the Shooting phase, you can roll a D6 for one friendly <ORDO> unit within 3" of this model and apply the result from the following table to that unit for the remainder of the phase.  1-2  -  Augmented Targeting: The unit can re-roll failed hit rolls. 3-4  -  Augmented Penetration: The unit can re-roll failed wound rolls. 5-6  -  The Works: The unit can re-roll failed hit and wound rolls.
